channel.title: CVE Feed for florent73 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for florent73 -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-1472|2024-02-20T18:56:33.389Z -- florent73 -- WP Maintenance
item.description: The WP Maintenance plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 6.1.6 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to bypass the plugin's maintenance mode obtain post and page content via REST API.

item.title: CVE-2024-3585|2024-05-02T16:51:43.101Z -- florent73 -- Send PDF for Contact Form 7
item.description: The Send PDF for Contact Form 7 plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of form submissions due to a missing capability check on the hooks function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.2.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to download information about contact form entries with PDFs.
